message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for $200. I believe it's a fantastic deal considering its value. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I was hoping to stay within my budget. Would you consider lowering the price to $175?
Hi Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $200 is already a very competitive price for this item.  Could you meet me halfway at $187?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I would like to stick to my budget. Could we agree on $175 for the product?
